content:
/>
X.i.4.C.6.b
.
Corresponding With the Philippine Department of Foreign Affairs
When correspondence is received from the Philippine Department of Foreign Affairs, the
Manila RO may reply directly to the originator, and
reply may be released locally as provided by U.S. Embassy, Manila, directives.
ROs other than the Manila RO must reply to correspondence received from the Philippine Department of Foreign Affairs, Manila, by following the procedure in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.C.6.a
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
